column1: 2;"As expected, Avengers: Endgame shattered every opening week record in box office history as the Marvel epic opened with $1.2 billion worldwide and $350 million domestic," both new records.""
column4: 'Avengers: Endgame' shattered every opening week record in box office history as the Marvel epic opened with $1.2 billion worldwide.""
column5: Avengers End Game Breaks all Records"""
